javax.jcr.query.qom
Interface EquiJoinCondition

All Superinterfaces:
JoinCondition
public interface EquiJoinCondition
extends JoinCondition

Tests whether the value of a property in a first selector is equal to the value of a property in a second selector.

A node-tuple satisfies the constraint only if:

  • selector1 has a property named property1, and
  • selector2 has a property named property2, and
  • the value of property1 equals the value of property2

Since:
JCR 2.0
